General.Name: Anzheng Fashion
General.Description: Anzheng Fashion Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and brand management of apparel in China. The company sells its products under the JUZUI, IMM Yin Mo, ANZHENG, and MOISSAC brands. Anzheng Fashion Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Haining, China.
